text: When I notice power imbalances in my relationship, I recognize them and choose to work toward balance instead.
During moments when I feel dominant or submissive, I notice it and choose to understand what's creating the imbalance.
When I feel the pull to control or be controlled, I notice it and choose to seek equality instead.
I let unequal power dynamics create problems and prevent me from identifying and balancing power in relationships.
When I notice myself taking too much or too little power, I recognize it and choose to adjust the balance.
I see when power dynamics are unhealthy, and I choose to address them and work toward equality instead.
When I feel the urge to dominate or submit, I notice it and choose to understand the underlying need instead.
I let not identifying power balance prevent me from creating equal, balanced dynamics in relationships.
When I notice balanced power dynamics, I recognize them and choose to maintain that equality.
I recognize when power imbalances come from old patterns rather than present needs, and I respond accordingly.
When I feel the pull to let power dynamics become extreme, I notice it and choose to restore balance instead.
I let dominant or submissive dynamics prevent me from identifying and creating balanced power in relationships.
When I notice power shifting, I recognize it and choose to adjust toward balance with awareness.
I see when equality is present, and I choose to recognize and maintain that balanced dynamic.
When I feel the urge to let power imbalances persist, I notice it and choose to address them directly instead.
I let problems from unequal power prevent me from identifying and balancing power dynamics in relationships.
When I notice healthy power balance, I recognize it and choose to strengthen those patterns.
I recognize when power needs adjustment, and I choose to work together to create equality.
When I feel the pull to avoid addressing power imbalances, I notice it and choose to face them honestly instead.
I let not identifying power balance prevent me from creating equal, balanced dynamics in relationships.
